Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.75095436 0.92290208 0.73470088 0.79073095 0.16314341 0.03032174
#>  [7] 0.71491567 0.84458453 0.28644941 0.04311359 0.16484014 0.27519002
#> [13] 0.82342731 0.21081245 0.89186891 0.01101212 0.40905817 0.39057382
#> [19] 0.02301914 0.84325536
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.07640097 0.95205883 0.05126207 0.23572992 0.14466072 0.26435647
#>  [7] 0.99138341 0.64225218 0.16308698 0.71886722 0.50997151 0.57213402
#> [13] 0.92477878 0.31235525 0.11112026 0.93409981 0.95855508 0.20012972
#> [19] 0.63660114 0.95286442

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.3350613 0.1385040 0.5218688 0.9362746 0.9653310 0.3407434 0.6350859
#>  [8] 0.6772962 0.1557909 0.5657059
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.4159643 0.8655799 0.0838576 0.5731890 0.4035226 0.8234849 0.3782164
#>  [8] 0.2850504 0.8376683 0.3253905
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.11839219 0.21170628 0.38419132 0.58079476 0.51282802 0.01562981
#>  [7] 0.16750323 0.18142559 0.50828079 0.97940923

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.90869371 0.62852649 0.09300369 0.57713405 0.92568226
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.4680300 0.6613402 0.4920010 0.8166671 0.2942019
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.7550968 0.7275012 0.8393599 0.2955595 0.8435393
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.1913404 0.5801701 0.4215248 0.3938887 0.8715062

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.2346532 0.9952488 0.3861128 0.9287176 0.1248096
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.9972173 0.8264239 0.6830369 0.5385587 0.1722882
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.8373077 0.9340800 0.6841881 0.5719734 0.3262986
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.4235011 0.7865661 0.4768162 0.5295848 0.8647320

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.5438283 0.1096153 0.6712340 0.3449598 0.8708311
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.9634344 0.1592353 0.3295215 0.8957419 0.6984819
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.56063768 0.02187055 0.60560152 0.24988435 0.49391747
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.00556239 0.60282457 0.24969012 0.41761933 0.56546283

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.1         3.4          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 2          6.4         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          6.3         3.3          4.7         1.6 versicolor
#> 4          6.7         3.3          5.7         2.1  virginica
#> 5          4.9         3.6          1.4         0.1     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.5         4.2          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 2          4.4         3.0          1.3         0.2     setosa
#> 3          6.2         2.9          4.3         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          4.8         3.4          1.9         0.2     setosa
#> 5          6.7         3.0          5.0         1.7 versicolor
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          5.1         3.8          1.6         0.2     setosa
#> 2          5.6         2.7          4.2         1.3 versicolor
#> 3          6.7         3.0          5.2         2.3  virginica
#> 4          5.2         4.1          1.5         0.1     setosa
#> 5          6.6         2.9          4.6         1.3 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           6.7         2.5
#> 2           4.4         3.0
#> 3           6.6         2.9
#> 4           6.9         3.1
#> 5           5.8         2.7
#> 6           6.3         2.3
#> 7           6.7         3.0
#> 8           5.4         3.4
#> 9           7.3         2.9
#> 10          6.4         2.8
#> 11          6.3         2.8
#> 12          6.0         3.4
#> 13          5.4         3.9
#> 14          5.2         3.5
#> 15          6.5         3.0
#> 16          4.4         3.2
#> 17          5.1         3.3
#> 18          7.9         3.8
#> 19          7.1         3.0
#> 20          6.3         2.9

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.3         3.4
#> 2          5.5         4.2
#> 3          5.2         2.7
#> 4          4.7         3.2
#> 5          4.9         3.0
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.2         2.8
#> 2          5.0         2.3
#> 3          5.4         3.9
#> 4          6.8         2.8
#> 5          4.9         3.1
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.7         2.9
#> 2          5.8         2.8
#> 3          6.0         3.4
#> 4          5.6         3.0
#> 5          7.7         2.6
